name: Meltdown Oil for Acne Prone Skin
about: What it is: An oil for blemish-prone skin that reduces the appearance of blemishes and targets future breakouts while keeping your skin hydrated, nourished, and visibly even toned...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Redness, and Acne and Blemishes..Formulation: Oil..Highlighted Ingredients:- Black Cumin Seed: A calming oil that visibly targets blemishes, reduces redness, and soothes irritation..- Blue Tansy: Naturally fights the look of blemishes while calming and soothing..- Rosehip Oil: Fades the look of scars, visibly evens out skin tone, and hydrates...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This visible blemish-fighting oil is formulated with a powerful blend of clean ingredients for clearer-looking skin. It fights blemishes with its antibacterial and calming properties, reduces the appearance of blemish scars, and targets future breakoutsu2014all while leaving your skin feeling hydrated and clear, never dry or oily...Clinical Results: In a Blume-conducted study of 30 participants:.- Participants saw results in the size of their acne and an improvement in skin texture after 48 hours.- Participants saw an improvement in their skin texture after 1 week of use.- Participants agree that Meltdown Oil helped their acne heal faster..Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: Black Cumin Seed Oil, Rosehip Oil, Tamanu Seed Oil, Sunflower Seed Oil, Comfrey Root Extract, Olive Leaf Extract, Lavender Oil, Jojoba Seed Oil, Tea Tree Oil, Helichrysum Flower Oil, Blue Tansy, Chamomile Flower Oil, Rosemary Leaf Extract..The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.

reviews.review_text: i had high hopes for this because i have dry acne prone skin. it broke me out so bad. i used it for 3 months and tried paring it with other products but it broke me out no matter what.   works well for my upper face but not my chin.

The first pic is maybe a month into use, and the second pics are 6 months in. I still get the odd hormonal breakouts, but Iu2019m so much more confident in my skin :)
